uvi.description:
virtio-blk: Fix memory leak among suspend/resume procedure

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.240 by commit 863da837964c80c72e368a4f748c30d25daa1815. For more details please see the references link.
